Uses of Class
com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model.HelperQuery

  • Packages that use HelperQuery 
    Package Description
    com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model  

    • Uses of HelperQuery in com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model

      Methods in com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model that return types with arguments of type HelperQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<HelperQuery> HelperConnection.executeQueue()
      Executes the queries in the queue in sequence and returns the successfully executed queries (the errored queries can be found in the error list).
      java.util.List<HelperQuery> HelperConnection.getErrorQueries() 
      java.util.List<HelperQuery> HelperConnection.getExecutedQueries() 
      java.util.List<HelperQuery> HelperConnection.getQueuedQueries() 
      Methods in com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model with parameters of type HelperQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HelperConnection.addQueryToQueue(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Adds the helperQuery to the queue
      int[] HelperConnection.executeBatchQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given helperQuery's query and fills it with batches of the HelperQuery's QueryParameters then executes the PreparedStatement in batch and returns the returned int[]
      java.sql.ResultSet HelperConnection.executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the first of the QueryParameters in the HelperQuery's list
      java.sql.ResultSet HelperConnection.executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery, int pos)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the pos (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.) QueryParameters of the HelperQuery's QueryParameter list
      java.sql.ResultSet HelperConnection.executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery, QueryParameter... parameters)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the given QueryParameters
      Method parameters in com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model with type arguments of type HelperQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HelperConnection.setErrorQueries(java.util.List<HelperQuery> errorQueries) 
      void HelperConnection.setExecutedQueries(java.util.List<HelperQuery> executedQueries) 
      void HelperConnection.setQueuedQueries(java.util.List<HelperQuery> queuedQueries)
